document.full_text: two u.s. astronauts and a russian crewmate blasted off successfully wednesday on a mission to the international space station that will see the last ever shuttle visit to the orbiting lab.
document.title: u.s.-russian crew blasts off to space station
lines_and_colors: two u.s. astronauts and a russian crewmate blasted off successfully wednesday on a mission to the international space station that will see the last ever shuttle visit to the orbiting lab.
